title: Pixel's camera dost nor work in panorama mode
content:
Hi, please help me!
If I switch to panorama mode and push the button for taking picture the display "begins moving" and a red rectangle is rotating and "falling down". But I'm holding stable the phone, do not make any movement. (Nor my hands.)
Therefore I can not make any panorama photo. 
How can I fix this issue?
Thanks for your help!
best regards, Zolt√°n
